name: MLK: FAA Dark Theme Version 9.66
description:
Taking the very bright and limited size-layout of MLKFAA, and allowing it to stretch to fit your monitor, and giving it a darker, far less eye-straining pallet.

Please report here in this forum for bugs and issues:
https://forum.userstyles.org/discussion/49763/my-lion-king-fan-art-albums-dark-theme#latest
